description.narrative: The proposed Asian Development Bank (ADB) assistance will support the Guizhou Provincial Government (GPG) to improve the quality of technical and vocational education and training (TVET) in the province, and to make TVET more relevant to employers' needs. Developing high-quality TVET is a GPG priority for expanding and developing the provincial workforce to facilitate continued inclusive economic growth, reduce rural poverty, and to improve the employment prospects of young workers seeking jobs.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: An inclusive and responsive TVET system developed

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

a. Number of graduates in Demonstration TVET Institutions increases from 30,279 annually (baseline in 2013) to 34,000 annually by 2019, sex disaggregated, ethnicity, and rural/urban, poor/non-poor (DLI 1)

description.narrative: An inclusive and responsive TVET system developed

title.narrative: b. Employer satisfaction rate with quality TVET graduates maintained% (baseline 91% for secondary TVET, and 95% for tertiary TVET graduates) (RF)

description.narrative: An inclusive and responsive TVET system developed
